name: Crab Quiche
ingredients: 1/2 tsp. each of salt and pepper
instructions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Bake crust 10 minutes and allow to cool. Whisk together all other ingredients and pour in crust. Bake 25-30 minutes, then turn off oven and let sit 20-30 minutes (gives smoother texture and makes it firm).
